468:1: atha khalu bhagavataḥ purastāttataḥ pṛthivīpradeśāt parṣanmadhyāt saptaratnamayaḥ stūpo'bhyudgataḥ pañcayojanaśatānyuccaistvena tadanurūpeṇa ca pariṇāhena|
468:2: abhyudgamya vaihāyasamantarīkṣe samavātiṣṭhaccitro darśanīyaḥ pañcabhiḥ puṣpagrahaṇīyavedikāsahasraiḥ svabhyalaṃkṛto bahutoraṇasahasraiḥ pratimaṇḍitaḥ patākāvaijayantīsahasrābhiḥ pralambito ratnadāmasahasrābhiḥ pralambitaḥ paṭṭaghaṇṭāsahasraiḥ pralambitaḥ tamālapatracandanagandhaṃ pramuñcamānaḥ|
468:3: tena ca gandhena sarvāvatīyaṃ lokadhātuḥ saṃmūrcchitābhūt|
468:5: tadyathā-suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya musāragalvasyāśmagarbhasya lohitamukteḥ karketanasya|
468:6: tasmiṃśca stūpe trāyastriṃśatkāyikā devaputrā divyairmāndāravamahāmāndāravaiḥ puṣpaistaṃ ratnastūpamavakiranti adhyavakiranti abhiprakiranti|
468:7: tasmācca ratnastūpādevaṃrūpaḥ śabdo niścarati sma-sādhu sādhu bhagavan śākyamune|
468:11: atha khalu tāścatasraḥ parṣadastaṃ mahāntaṃ ratnastūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā vaihāyasamantarīkṣe sthitaṃ saṃjātaharṣāḥ prītiprāmodyaprasādaprāptāḥ tasyāṃ velāyāmutthāya āsanebhyo'ñjaliṃ pragṛhyāvasthitāḥ||
468:12: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāpratibhāno nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ kautūhalaprāptaṃ viditvā bhagavantametadavocat-ko bhagavan hetuḥ,
468:15: ko vā bhagavan asmānmahāratnastūpādevaṃrūpaṃ śabdaṃ niścārayati?
468:16: evamukte bhagavān mahāpratibhānaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-asmin mahāpratibhāna mahāratnastūpe tathāgatasyātmabhāvastiṣṭhati ekaghanaḥ|
468:19: asti mahāpratibhāna adhastāyāṃ diśi asaṃkhyeyāni lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya ratnaviśuddhā nāma lokadhātuḥ|
468:21: tasyaitadbhagavataḥ purvapraṇidhānamabhūt-ahaṃ khalu pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇo na tāvanniryāto'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
468:22: yāvanmayāyaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo bodhisattvāvavādo na śruto'bhūt|
468:23: yadā tu mayā ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ śrutaḥ,
468:25: tena khalu punarmahāpratibhāna bhagavatā prabhūtaratnena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena parinirvāṇakālasamaye sadevakasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ purastādevamārocitam-mama khalu bhikṣavaḥ parinirvṛtasya asya tathāgatātmabhāvavigrahasya eko mahāratnastūpaḥ kartavyaḥ|
468:27: tasya khalu punarmahāpratibhāna bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyaitadadhiṣṭhānamabhūt-ayaṃ mama stūpo daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu yeṣu buddhakṣetreṣvayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ saṃprakāśyeta,
468:29: taistairbuddhairbhagavadbhirasmin saddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe parṣanmaṇḍalasyopari vaihāyasaṃ tiṣṭhet|
468:30: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmimaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣamāṇānāmayaṃ mamātmabhāvavigrahastūpaḥ sādhukāraṃ dadyāt|
468:31: tadayaṃ mahāpratibhāna tasya bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śarīrastūpaḥ|
468:32: asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau asmin saddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye mayā bhāṣyamāṇe'smāt parṣanmaṇḍalamadhyādabhyudgamya uparyantarīkṣe vaihāyasaṃ sthitvā sādhukāraṃ dadāti sma||
468:33: atha khalu mahāpratibhāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat-paśyāma vayaṃ bhagavan etaṃ tathāgatavigrahaṃ bhagavato'nubhāvena|
468:34: evamukte bhagavān mahāpratibhānaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-tasya khalu punarmahāpratibhāna bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya praṇidhānaṃ gurukamabhūt|
468:35: etadasya praṇidhānam-yadā khalvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhā bhagavanta imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣeyuḥ,
468:36: tadāyaṃ mamātmabhāvavigrahastūpo'sya saddharmapuṇḍarīkasya dharmaparyāyasya śravaṇāya gacchet tathāgatānāmantikam|
468:37: yadā punaste buddhā bhagavanto mamātmabhāvavigrahamuddhāṭya darśayitukāmā bhaveyuścatasṛṇāṃ parṣadām,
468:38: atha taistathāgatairdaśasu dikṣvanyonyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ya ātmabhāvanirmitāstathāgatavigrahā anyānyanāmadheyāḥ,
468:39: teṣu teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti,
468:40: tān sarvān saṃnipātya tairātmabhāvanirmitaistathāgatavigrahaiḥ sārdhaṃ paścādayaṃ mamātmabhāvavigrahastūpaḥ samuddhāṭya upadarśayitavyaścatasṛṇāṃ parṣadām|
468:42: ye daśasu dikṣvanyonyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu lokadhātusahasreṣu sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti|
468:44: atha khalu mahāpratibhāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat-tānapi tāvad bhagavaṃstathāgatātmabhāvāṃstathāgatanirmitān sarvān vandāmahai||
468:46: yayā raśmyā samanantarapramuktayā pūrvasyāṃ diśi pañcāśatsu gaṅgānadīvālukāsameṣu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye buddhā bhagavanto viharanti sma,
468:48: tāni ca buddhakṣetrāṇi sphaṭikamayāni saṃdṛśyante sma,
468:51: teṣu teṣu buddhā bhagavanto madhureṇa valgunā svareṇa sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma|
468:52: bodhisattvaśatasahasraiśca paripūrṇāni tāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saṃdṛśyante sma|
468:62: evaṃ samantāddaśasu dikṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśi bahūni gaṅgānadīvālukopamāni buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi bahuṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti,
468:64: atha khalu te daśasu dikṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ svān svān bodhisattvagaṇānāmantrayanti sma-gantavyaṃ khalu punaḥ kulaputrā bhaviṣyati asmābhiḥ sahāṃ lokadhātum,
468:67: atha khalu te buddhā bhagavantaḥ svaiḥ svairupasthāyakaiḥ sārdhamātmadvitīyā ātmatṛtīyā imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchanti sma|
468:68: iti hi tasmin samaye iyaṃ sarvāvatī lokadhātū ratnavṛkṣapratimaṇḍitābhūd vaiḍūryamayī saptaratnahemajālasaṃchannā mahāratnagandhadhūpanadhūpitā māndāravamahāmāndāravapuṣpasaṃstīrṇā kiṅkiṇījālālaṃkṛtā suvarṇasūtrāṣṭāpadanibaddhā apagatagrāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānī apagatakālaparvatā apagatamucilindamahāmucilindaparvatā apagatacakravālamahācakravālaparvatā apagatasumeruparvatā apagatatadanyamahāparvatā apagatamahāsamudrā apagatanadīmahānadīparisaṃsthitābhūt,
468:70: iti hi tasmin samaye ye'syāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau ṣaḍgatyupapannāḥ sattvāḥ,
468:72: sthāpayitvā ye tasyāṃ parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan|
468:73: atha khalu te buddhā bhagavanta upasthāyakadvitīyā upasthāyakatṛtīyā imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchanti sma|
468:74: āgatāgatāśca te tathāgatā ratnavṛkṣamūle siṃhāsanamupaniśritya viharanti sma|
468:76: ekaikasmiṃśca ratnavṛkṣamūle siṃhāsanaṃ prajñaptamabhūt pañcayojanaśatānyuccaistvena mahāratnapratimaṇḍitam|
468:78: anena paryāyeṇa sarvasyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sarvaratnavṛkṣamūleṣu tathāgatāḥ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā niṣaṇṇā abhūvan||
468:79: tena khalu punaḥ samayena iyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrī lokadhātustathāgataparipūrṇābhūt|
468:80: na tāvad bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyātmabhāvanirmitā ekasmādapi digbhāgāt sarva āgatā abhūvan|
468:81: atha khalu punarbhagavān śākyamunistathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhasteṣāṃ tathāgatavigrahāṇāmāgatāgatānāmavakāśaṃ nirmimīte sma|
468:82: samantādaṣṭabhyo digbhyo viṃśatibuddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi sarvāṇi vaiḍūryamayāni saptaratnahemajālasaṃchannāni kiṅkiṇījālālaṃkṛtāni māndāravamahāmāndāravapuṣpasaṃstīrṇāni divyavitānavitatāni divyapuṣpadāmābhipralambitāni divyagandhadhūpanadhūpitāni|
468:83: sarvāṇi ca tāni viṃśatibuddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyapagatagrāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīni apagatakālaparvatāni apagatamucilindamahāmucilindaparvatāni apagatacakravālamahācakravālaparvatāni apagatasumeruparvatāni apagatatadanyamahāparvatāni apagatamahāsamudrāṇi apagatanadīmahānadīni parisaṃsthāpayati apagatadevamanuṣyāsurakāyāni apagatanirayatiryagyoniyamalokāni|
468:84: tāni ca sarvāṇi bahubuddhakṣetrāṇi ekameva buddhakṣetramekameva pṛthivīpradeśaṃ parisaṃsthāpayāmāsa samaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ saptaratnamayaiśca vṛkṣaiścitritam|
468:86: sarvasmiṃśca ratnavṛkṣamūle pañcayojanaśatānyārohapariṇāhaṃ divyaratnamayaṃ vicitraṃ darśanīyaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ prajñaptamabhūt|
468:87: teṣu ratnavṛkṣamūleṣvāgatāgatāstathāgatāḥ siṃhāsaneṣu paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā niṣīdante sma|
468:88: anena paryāyeṇa punaraparāṇi viṃśatilokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyekaikasyāṃ diśi śākyamunistathāgataḥ pariśodhayati sma teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgatānāmavakāśārtham|
468:89: tānyapi viṃśatilokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyaikaikasyāṃ diśi apagatagrāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīni apagatakālaparvatāni apagatamucilindamahāmucilindaparvatāni apagatacakravālamahācakravālaparvatāni apagatasumeruparvatāni apagatatadanyamahāparvatāni apagatamahāsamudrāṇi apagatanadīmahānadīni parisaṃsthāpayati apagatadevamanuṣyāsurakāyāni apagatanirayatiryagyoniyamalokāni|
468:91: tānyapi buddhakṣetrāṇi vaiḍūryamayāni saptaratnahemajālapraticchannāni kiṅkiṇījālālaṃkṛtāni māndāravamahāmāndāravapuṣpasaṃstīrṇāni divyavitānavitatāni divyapuṣpadāmābhipralambitāni divyagandhadhūpanadhūpitāni ratnavṛkṣopaśobhitāni|
468:94: tataste tathāgatā niṣīdante sma pṛthak pṛthak siṃhāsaneṣu ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā||
468:95: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavatā śākyamuninā ye nirmitāstathāgatāḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti sma gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu,
468:97: te cāgatā aṣṭāsu dikṣu niṣaṇṇā abhūvan|
468:98: tena khalu punaḥ samayenaikaikasyāṃ diśi triṃśallokadhātukoṭīśatasahasrāṇyaṣṭabhyo digbhyaḥ samantāttaistathāgatairākrāntā abhūvan|
468:99: atha khalu te tathāgatāḥ sveṣu sveṣu siṃhāsaneṣūpaviṣṭāḥ svān svānupasthāyakān saṃpreṣayanti sma bhagavataḥ śākyamunerantikam|
468:100: ratnapuṣpapuṭān datvā evaṃ vadanti sma-gacchata yūyaṃ gṛdhrakūṭaṃ parvatam|
468:101: gatvā ca punastasmiṃstaṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ vanditvā asmadvacanādalpābādhatāṃ mandaglānatāṃ ca balaṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchadhvaṃ sārdhaṃ bodhisattvagaṇena śrāvakagaṇena|
468:103: evaṃ ca vadadhvam-dadāti khalu punarbhagavāṃstathāgataśchandamasya mahāratnastūpasya samuddhāṭane|
468:104: evaṃ te tathāgatāḥ sarve svān svānupasthāyakān saṃpreṣayāmāsuḥ||
468:105: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgatastasyāṃ velāyāṃ svānnirmitānaśeṣataḥ samāgatān viditvā,
468:110: tāśca sarvāścatasraḥ pariṣadaḥ utthāyāsanebhyo'ñjalīḥ parigṛhya bhagavato mukhamullokayantyastasthuḥ|
468:111: atha khalu bhagavāṃstaṃ mahāntaṃ ratnastūpaṃ vaihāyasaṃ sthitaṃ dakṣiṇayā hastāṅgulyā madhye samuddhāṭayati sma|
468:112: samuddhāṭya ca dve bhittī pravisārayati sma|
468:114: evameva bhagavāṃstaṃ mahāntaṃ ratnastūpaṃ vaihāyasaṃ sthitaṃ dakṣiṇayā hastāṅgulyā madhye samuddhāṭya apāvṛṇoti sma|
468:116: atha khalu bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ siṃhāsanopaviṣṭaḥ paryaṅkaṃ baddvā pariśuṣkagātraḥ saṃghaṭitakāyo yathā samādhisamāpannastathā saṃdṛśyate sma|
468:117: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣata-sādhu sādhu bhagavan śākyamune|
468:119: sādhu khalu punastvaṃ bhagavan śākyamune yastvamimaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ parṣanmadhye bhāṣase|
468:121: atha khalu tāścatasraḥ parṣadastaṃ bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ bahukalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraparinirvṛtaṃ tathā bhāṣamāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā abhūvan|
468:122: tasyāṃ velāyāṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddha taṃ ca bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ divyamānuṣyakai ratnarāśibhirabhyavakiranti sma|
468:123: atha khalu bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tasminneva siṃhāsane'rdhāsanamadāsīt,
468:125: evaṃ ca vadati-ihaiva bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato niṣīdatu|
468:126: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgatastasminnardhāsane niṣasāda tenaiva tathāgatena sārdham|
468:127: ubhau ca tau tathāgatau tasya mahāratnastūpasya madhye siṃhāsanopaviṣṭau vaihāyasamantarīkṣasthau saṃdṛśyete||
468:128: atha khalu tāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāmetadabhavat-dūrasthā vayamābhyāṃ tathāgatābhyām|
468:130: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgatastāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tasyāṃ velāyāmṛddhibalena tāścatasraḥ parṣado vaihāyasamuparyantarīkṣe pratiṣṭhāpayati sma|
468:131: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgatastasyāṃ velāyāṃ tāścatasraḥ parṣada āmantrayate sma-ko bhikṣavo yuṣmākamutsahate tasyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayitum?
468:136: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
468:173: mayi nirvṛte yo etaṃ dharmaparyāyu dhārayet|
468:176: siṃhanādaṃ śruṇe tasya vyavasāyaṃ karoti yaḥ||11||
468:181: ahaṃ ca tena bhavi pūjitaḥ sadā
468:201: bhavāgre yaśca tiṣṭhitvā dharmaṃ bhāṣennaro iha|
468:204: ya idaṃ dhārayet sūtraṃ bhāṣedvā tatsuduṣkaram||21||
468:206: prakṣipitvā ca gaccheta na tadbhavati duṣkaram||22||
468:209: pṛthivīdhātuṃ ca yaḥ sarvaṃ nakhāgre saṃpraveśayet|
468:210: prakṣipitvā ca gaccheta brahmalokaṃ pi āruhet||24||
468:211: na duṣkaraṃ hi so kuryānna ca vīryasya tattakam|
468:214: paścātkāle idaṃ sūtraṃ vadeyā yo muhūrtakam||26||
468:215: na duṣkaramidaṃ loke kalpadāhasmi yo naraḥ|
468:221: na hyetaṃ duṣkaraṃ bhoti tasmin kālasmi bhikṣuṇām|
468:223: tasyedaṃ duṣkarataraṃ idaṃ sūtraṃ ca dhārayet|
468:227: ato bahutaraṃ karma karoti sa narottamaḥ|
468:228: nirvṛtasya hi yo mahyaṃ sūtraṃ dhārayate varam||33||
468:232: dhāreti yo idaṃ sūtraṃ sa dhāre jinavigraham||35||
468:234: ya utsahati vaḥ kaścit paścātkālasmi dhāraṇam||36||
468:244: paścime kāli yo bhāṣet sūtramekaṃ muhūrtakam||41||
468:245: atha khalu bhagavān kṛtsnaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ sasurāsuraṃ ca lokamāmantraya etadavocat-bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo'tīte'dhvani ahamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyān kalpān saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ sūtraṃ paryeṣitavānakhinno'viśrāntaḥ|
468:246: pūrvaṃ ca ahamanekān kalpānanekāni kalpaśatasahasrāṇi rājābhūvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ|
468:252: tena ca samayena ayaṃ loko dīrghāyurabhat|
468:253: anekavarṣaśatasahasrajīvitena ca ahaṃ kālena dharmārthaṃ rājyaṃ kāritavān,
468:255: so'haṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ kumāraṃ rājye'bhiṣicya caturdiśaṃ jyeṣṭhadharmagaveṣaṇāya udyukto'bhūvam|
468:256: evaṃ ghaṇṭayā ghoṣāpayitavān-yo me jyeṣṭhaṃ dharmamanupradāsyati,
468:260: sa māmetadavocat-asti mahārāja saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma sutraṃ jyeṣṭhadharmanirdeśakam|
468:263: so'haṃ śrutvā tasyarṣervacanaṃ hṛṣṭastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ prītisaumanasyajāto yena sa ṛṣistenopeyivān|
468:267: divasaṃ caivaṃvidhaṃ karma kṛtvā rātrau śayānasya mañcake pādān dhārayāmi|
468:268: na ca me kāyaklamo na cetasi klamo'bhūt|
468:269: evaṃ ca me kurvataḥ paripūrṇaṃ varṣāsahasraṃ gatam||
468:270: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmetamevārthaṃ paridyotayannimā gāthā abhāṣata—
468:291: tatkiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājābhūt?
468:294: ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājābhūvam|
468:295: syātkhalu punarbhikṣavo'nyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayenarṣirabhūt?
468:297: ayameva sa tena kālena tena samayena devadatto bhikṣurṛṣirabhut|
468:299: devadattameva cāgamya mayā ṣaṭū pāramitāḥ paripūritāḥ,
468:301: dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni aśītyanuvyañjanāni suvarṇavarṇacchavitā daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catvāri saṃgrahavastūni aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā maharddhibalatā daśadiksattvanistāraṇatā,
468:304: prativedayāmi- eṣa devadatto bhikṣuranāgate'dhvani aprameyaiḥ kalpairasaṃkhyeyairdevarājo nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca bhagavān devasopānāyāṃ lokadhātau|
468:311: devarājasya khalu punarbhikṣavastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya viṃśatyantarakalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati|
468:313: ekaghanaṃ cāsya śarīraṃ bhaviṣyati saptaratnastūpaṃ praviṣṭam|
468:316: sarve ca tatra devamanuṣyāḥ pūjāṃ kariṣyanti puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhirgāthābhiḥ|
468:318: ye ca taṃ stūpaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kariṣyanti praṇāmaṃ vā,
468:319: teṣāṃ kecidagraphalamarhattvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyanti kecit pratyekabodhimanuprāpsyante acintyācāścāprameyā devamanuṣyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādya avinivartanīyā bhaviṣyanti||
468:320: atha khalu bhagavān punareva bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayate sma-yaḥ kaścit bhikṣavo'nāgate'dhvani kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ sūtraparivartaṃ śroṣyati,
468:321: śrutvā ca na kāṅkṣiṣyati na vicikitsiṣyati,
468:323: tena tisṛṇāṃ durgatīnāṃ dvāraṃ pithitaṃ bhaviṣyati narakatiryagyoniyamalokopapattiṣu na patiṣyati|
468:327: tasminnaupapāduke saptaratnamaye padme upapatsyate tathāgatasya saṃmukham||
468:328: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāmadhastāddiśaḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādāgataḥ prajñākūṭo nāma bodhisattvaḥ|
468:329: sa taṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatametadavocat-gacchāmo bhagavan svakaṃ buddhakṣetram|
468:330: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgataḥ prajñākūṭaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat-muhūrtaṃ tāvat kulaputra āgamayasva yāvanmadīyena bodhisattvena mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena sārdhaṃ kaṃcideva dharmaviniścayaṃ kṛtvā paścāt svakaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ gamiṣyasi|
468:331: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ sahasrapatre padme śakaṭacakrapramāṇamātre niṣaṇṇo'nekabodhisattvaparivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ samudramadhyāt sāgaranāgarājabhavanādabhyudgamya upari vaihāyasaṃ khagapathena gṛdhrakūṭe parvate bhagavato'ntikamupasaṃkrāntaḥ|
468:332: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ padmādavatīrya bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ prabhūtaratnasya ca tathāgatasya pādau śirasābhivanditvā yena prajñākūṭo bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ|
468:333: upasaṃkramya prajñākūṭena bodhisattvena sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāmupasaṃgṛhya ekānte nyaṣīdat|
468:334: atha khalu prajñākūṭo bodhisattvo mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-samudramadhyagatena tvayā mañjuśrīḥ kiyān sattvadhāturvinītaḥ?
468:336: tāvadaprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni yāvadvācā na śakyaṃ vijñāpayituṃ cittena vā cintayitum|
468:337: muhūrtaṃ tāvat kulaputra āgamayasva yāvat pūrvanimittaṃ drakṣyasi|
468:339: tasyāṃ velāyāmanekāni padmasahasrāṇi samudramadhyādabhyudgatāni upari vaihāyasam|
468:341: atha te bodhisattvāstenaiva khagapathena yena gṛdhrakūṭaḥ parvatastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ|
468:342: upasaṃkramya tataścopari vaihāyasaṃ sthitāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma|
468:343: sarve ca te mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena vinītā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
468:347: sarve ca te sarvadharmān śūnyāniti saṃjānanti sma,
468:349: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ prajñākūṭaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat-sarvo'yaṃ kulaputra mayā samudramadhyagatena sattvavinayaḥ kṛtaḥ|
468:351: atha khalu prajñākūṭo bodhisattvo mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ gāthābhigītena paripṛcchati—
468:360: mañjuśrīrāha-samudramadhye saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ sūtraṃ bhāṣitavān, na cānyat|
468:361: prajñākūṭa āha-idaṃ sūtraṃ gambhīraṃ sūkṣmaṃ durdṛśam,
468:362: na cānena sutreṇa kiṃcidanyat sūtraṃ samamasti|
468:363: asti kaścit sattvo ya idaṃ sūtraratnaṃ satkuryādavaboddhumanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum?
468:364: mañjuśrīrāha-asti kulaputra sāgarasya nāgarājño duhitā aṣṭavarṣā jātyā mahāprajñā tīkṣṇendriyā jñānapūrvaṃgamena kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇā samanvāgatā sarvatathāgatabhāṣitavyañjanārthodgrahaṇe dhāraṇīpratilabdhā sarvadharmasattvasamādhānasamādhisahasraikakṣaṇapratilābhinī|
468:365: bodhicittāvinivartinī vistīrṇapraṇidhānā sarvasattveṣvātmapremānugatā guṇotpādane ca samarthā|
468:367: smitamukhī paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā maitracittā karuṇāṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣate|
468:369: prajñākūṭo bodhisattva āha-dṛṣṭo mayā bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato bodhāya ghaṭamāno bodhisattvabhūto'nekāni puṇyāni kṛtavān|
468:370: anekāni ca kalpasahasrāṇi na kadācid vīryaṃ sraṃsitavān|
468:371: trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau nāsti kaścidantaśaḥ sarṣapamātro'pi pṛthivīpradeśaḥ yatrānena śarīraṃ na nikṣiptaṃ sattvahitahetoḥ|
468:375: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ sāgaranāgarājaduhitā agrataḥ sthitā saṃdṛśyate sma|
468:378: puṇyaṃ puṇyaṃ gabhīraṃ ca diśaḥ sphurati sarvaśaḥ|
468:382: yathecchayā me saṃbodhiḥ sākṣī me'tra tathāgataḥ|
468:384: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāmāyuṣmān śāriputrastāṃ sāgaranāgarājaduhitarametadavocat-kevalaṃ kulaputri bodhāya cittamutpannam|
468:387: asti kulaputri strī na ca vīryaṃ sraṃsayati,
468:388: anekāni ca kalpaśatānyanekāni ca kalpasahasrāṇi puṇyāni karoti,
468:392: pañca sthānāni strī adyāpi na prāpnoti|
468:394: prathamaṃ brahmasthānaṃ dvitīyaṃ śakrasthānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ mahārājasthānaṃ caturthaṃ cakravartisthānaṃ pañcamamavaivartikabodhisattvasthānam||
468:395: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ sāgaranāgarājaduhitureko maṇirasti,
468:396: yaḥ kṛtsnāṃ mahāsāhasrāṃ lokadhātuṃ mūlyaṃ kṣamate|
468:397: sa ca maṇistayā sāgaranāgarājaduhitrā bhagavate dattaḥ|
468:399: atha sāgaranāgarājaduhitā prajñākūṭaṃ bodhisattvaṃ sthaviraṃ ca śāriputrametadavocat-yo'yaṃ maṇirmayā bhagavato dattaḥ,
468:400: sa ca bhagavatā śīrghraṃ pratigṛhīto veti?
468:401: sthavira āha-tvayā ca śīghraṃ datto bhagavatā ca śīghraṃ pratigṛhītaḥ|
468:402: sāgaranāgarājaduhitā āha-yadyahaṃ bhadanta śāriputra maharddhikī syām,
468:405: atha tasyāṃ velāyāṃ sāgaranāgarājaduhitā sarvalokapratyakṣaṃ sthavirasya ca śāriputrasya pratyakṣaṃ tat strīndriyamantarhitaṃ puruṣendriyaṃ ca prādurbhūtaṃ bodhisattvabhūtaṃ cātmānaṃ saṃdarśayati|
468:407: atha dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi vimalā nāma lokadhātuḥ|
468:408: tatra saptaratnamaye bodhivṛkṣamūle niṣaṇṇamabhisaṃbuddhamātmānaṃ saṃdarśayati sma,
468:409: dvātriṃśallakṣaṇadharaṃ sarvānuvyajanarūpaṃ prabhayā ca daśadiśaṃ sphuritvā dharmadeśanāṃ kurvāṇam|
468:411: te sarve taṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti sma,
468:413: ye ca sattvāstasya tathāgatasya dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇvanti,
468:416: iyaṃ ca sahā lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prākampat|
468:419: atha prajñākūṭo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sthaviraśca śāriputrastūṣṇīmabhūtām||
